bansystem.set_succes: The ban system has been successfully set up. Users with the {{yetkirole}} role will only be able to use the ban command.
bansystem.reset_succes: The ban system has been successfully reset. Only users with `Ban Members` authorization will be able to use the ban command.
bansystem.error: A reset cannot be performed when the Ban system is off.

kicksystem.set_succes: Kick system has been successfully set up. Users with the {{yetkirole}} role will only be able to use the kick command.
kicksystem.reset_succes: Kick system has been successfully reset. Only users with `Kick Members` authorization will be able to use the kick command.
kicksystem.error: A reset cannot be performed when the kick system is off.

autorole.set_succes: The automatic role system has been successfully installed. If the role <@{{botid}}> is not found on <@{{autorole}}>, the system will not work properly.
autorole.res_succes: The automatic role system has been successfully reset. New members joining the server will not be assigned any roles by the bot.
autorole.error: A reset cannot be performed when the auto-role system is off.

ban.succes: User successfully banned from the server.
ban.error-2: You cannot ban a user with the same authorization.
ban.error-3: You cannot ban a user with **Ban Members**.
ban.error-4: You cannot ban the server owner.
ban.error-7: You cannot ban a user for not being on the server.

kick.succes: User {{user}} was successfully kicked off the server.
kick.error-1: The user is not on the server, so you can't kick them.
kick.error-2: You can't kick a user you have the same authority over.
kick.error-3: You cannot kick a user with **Ban Members** authorization.
kick.error-4: You can't kick the server owner.

nuke.succes: The canal has been successfully reconstructed.

info.information_desc: Commands on this server start with `{{prefix}}`. You can find the list of commands hosted by the bot and our policies in the links below.

avatar.title: Avatar belonging to user {{target}}
avatar.description: [Click]({{avatar}}) to open the avatar in the browser

unban.succes: User with ID `{{id}}}` has been successfully unbanned.
unban.error: The user was not found in the banned list.

settings.title: Settings for the {{GuildName}} Server
settings.description: The following settings are only valid on the server you are on!

rolelog.res_succes: Sistem başarıyla sıfırlandı. Rol düzenlemelerine ait bilgiler artık alamayacaksınız.
rolelog.set_embed: **Rol takip bilgilendirme kanalı başarıyla bu kanala ayarlandı. Bu kanala eklenen, silinen ve güncellenen rol bilgileri paylaşılacaktır.**

welbylog.set_embed: **Gelen-Giden bilgilendirme kanalı başarıyla bu kanala ayarlandı. Bu kanala sunucuya giriş-çıkış yapan kullanıcıların bilgileri paylaşılacaktır.**

modlog.res_succes: Sistem başarıyla sıfırlandı. Moderatör eylemlerine ait bilgiler artık alamayacaksınız.
modlog.set_embed: **Moderatör takip bilgilendirme kanalı başarıyla bu kanala ayarlandı. Bu kanala moderatör eylemleri paylaşılacaktır.**

messagelog.res_succes: Sistem başarıyla sıfırlandı. Silinen ve düzenlenen mesajlara ait bilgiler alamayacaksınız.
messagelog.set_embed: **Mesaj takip bilgilendirme kanalı başarıyla bu kanala ayarlandı. Bu kanala silinen ve güncellenen mesaj bilgileri paylaşılacaktır.**

channellog.res_succes: Sistem başarıyla sıfırlandı. Artık düzenlenen kanallara ait bilgiler alamayacaksınız.
channellog.set_embed: **Kanal takip bilgilendirme kanalı başarıyla bu kanala ayarlandı. Bu kanala eklenen, silinen ve güncellenen kanal bilgileri paylaşılacaktır.**

on.title: Profanity Blocking System
on.description: The profanity blocking system has been activated on this server.

off.title: Profanity Blocking System
off.description: The profanity blocking system has been disabled on this server.

on.title: Ad Blocking System
on.description: Ad blocking system is activated on this server.

off.title: Ad Blocking System
off.description: Ad blocking is disabled on this server.

ping.reply_message: You can see the delay information of the system
